title: Storm
author: D.J. MacHale
description: The second book in the Pendragon series. Bobby Pendragon continues his journey across the ten 'territories' of Halla to fight against the evil Saint Dane. In this installment, Bobby travels to Denduron, a world threatened by tyranny and war, facing moral dilemmas, danger, and complex choices that shape his destiny as a Traveler.
